actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay certain funeral expenses for former prisoners of war and for recipients of the Purple Heart Medal.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to extend burial benefits to former prisoners of war and to recipients of the Purple Heart Medal.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to pay certain funeral expenses for former prisoners of war and for recipients of the Purple Heart Medal.
